018package net.sf.hajdbc.cache;
019
020import java.sql.DatabaseMetaData;
021import java.sql.SQLException;
022import java.util.Arrays;
023import java.util.Collection;
024import java.util.List;
025import java.util.Map;
026import java.util.Map.Entry;
027
028import net.sf.hajdbc.DatabaseProperties;
029import net.sf.hajdbc.QualifiedName;
030import net.sf.hajdbc.SequenceProperties;
031import net.sf.hajdbc.TableProperties;
032
033/**
034 * @author Paul Ferraro
035 *
036 */
037public abstract class AbstractDatabaseProperties implements DatabaseProperties
038{
039        private final DatabaseMetaDataSupport support;
040        private final boolean supportsSelectForUpdate;
041        private final boolean locatorsUpdateCopy;
042        
043        public AbstractDatabaseProperties(DatabaseMetaData metaData, DatabaseMetaDataSupport support) throws SQLException
044        {
045                this.support = support;
046                this.supportsSelectForUpdate = metaData.supportsSelectForUpdate();
047                this.locatorsUpdateCopy = metaData.locatorsUpdateCopy();
048        }
049        
050        /**
051         * @see net.sf.hajdbc.DatabaseProperties#supportsSelectForUpdate()
052         */
053        @Override
054        public final boolean supportsSelectForUpdate() throws SQLException
055        {
056                return this.supportsSelectForUpdate;
057        }
058        
059        /**
060         * {@inheritDoc}
061         * @see net.sf.hajdbc.DatabaseProperties#locatorsUpdateCopy()
062         */
063        @Override
064        public boolean locatorsUpdateCopy() throws SQLException
065        {
066                return this.locatorsUpdateCopy;
067        }
068
069        /**
070         * @see net.sf.hajdbc.DatabaseProperties#getTables()
071         */
072        @Override
073        public final Collection<TableProperties> getTables() throws SQLException
074        {
075                return this.tables().values();
076        }
077
078        protected abstract Map<QualifiedName, TableProperties> tables() throws SQLException;
079
080        /**
081         * @see net.sf.hajdbc.DatabaseProperties#getSequences()
082         */
083        @Override
084        public final Collection<SequenceProperties> getSequences() throws SQLException
085        {
086                return this.sequences().values();
087        }
088
089        protected abstract Map<QualifiedName, SequenceProperties> sequences() throws SQLException;
090        
091        /**
092         * @see net.sf.hajdbc.DatabaseProperties#findTable(java.lang.String)
093         */
094        @Override
095        public final TableProperties findTable(String table) throws SQLException
096        {
097                return this.support.find(this.tables(), table, this.defaultSchemas());
098        }
099
100        /**
101         * @see net.sf.hajdbc.DatabaseProperties#findSequence(java.lang.String)
102         */
103        @Override
104        public final SequenceProperties findSequence(String sequence) throws SQLException
105        {
106                return this.support.find(this.sequences(), sequence, this.defaultSchemas());
107        }
108
109        protected abstract List<String> defaultSchemas() throws SQLException;
110        
111        /**
112         * {@inheritDoc}
113         * @see net.sf.hajdbc.DatabaseProperties#findType(int, int[])
114         */
115        @Override
116        public String findType(int precision, int... types) throws SQLException
117        {
118                Map<Integer, Map.Entry<String, Integer>> map = this.types();
119
120                for (int type: types)
121                {
122                        Map.Entry<String, Integer> entry = map.get(type);
123                        if (entry != null)
124                        {
125                                String name = entry.getKey();
126                                Integer maxPrecision = entry.getValue();
127                                if (maxPrecision != null)
128                                {
129                                        String qualifier = "(" + ((precision == 0) ? maxPrecision : precision) + ")";
130                                        return name.contains("()") ? name.replace("()", qualifier) : name + qualifier;
131                                }
132                                
133                                return name;
134                        }
135                }
136                throw new SQLException("No native type found for " + Arrays.asList(types));
137        }
138        
139        protected abstract Map<Integer, Entry<String, Integer>> types() throws SQLException;
140}
